Title: Shounen Ashibe (TV)
Description: ['The anime is based on the 4-panel comic strip drawn by Morishita Hiromi and published in Young Jump. The story describes the daily life of Ashibe (an elementary school boy) and his family and friends, including a pet white sea lion.']
Staff: [['Suzuki, Yoshio', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Ikehata, Takashi', 'Storyboard'], ['Hosoda, Masahiro', 'Storyboard'], ['Morishita, Hiromi', 'Original Creator']]
